description: Miki Hisaya is a freshman at St. Ishiyama High School, and a member of the Rokkisei. He was once a friend of http://anidb.net/ch21279 [Oga] and http://anidb.net/ch21274 [Furuichi], who went to their middle school. He was friends with Oga, as he looked up to his strength and wished to be strong as well.
name: Miki Hisaya
